column4:
水くさいぜ。
祭りをやるなら、
一声かけてくれよ。
column5: If you're having a party, you shoulda invited me! Don't be a stranger!
column11: If you're having a party, you should have invited me. Don't be a stranger.

column4: エリー＿操縦小さい驚き

column5: There are still so many of them...

column5: I'll deal with the ones here.
